settings.title: Tautuhinga
settings.language.label: Reo a te kaupapa paetukutuku
settings.language.desc: Kōwhiri i te reo whakaatu mo te tono
settings.shortcuts.hotkeyDesc: Pēwhea ki te timata/whakatupuranga tae ki te kupu
settings.shortcuts.captureLabel: Pēwhea i a koe i te waihanga hou...
settings.shortcuts.editHotkeyDesc: Kōwhiri kupu, pēwhea tenei waihanga, whakataukī i te tohutohu whakatika
settings.shortcuts.editRequiresPolish: Me mahi whakaahuatia kia arataki te AI Polish
settings.mic.noMicDesc: Honoa hopuorooro, ka tirohia te tautuhinga pokapū
settings.stt.modeDesc: Kōwhiri kiapii tūturu, ka tutuki ranei API pokapū
settings.stt.languageDesc: Tohu ki te tauira kia whakaahuatia tenei reo; ko te putanga tuuturu pea ka rerekee
settings.stt.vadDesc: Filter out background noise before transcription
sttModel.largeV3Turbo.name: Whisper Turbo
sttModel.largeV3Turbo.desc: Te tika me te maha reo teitei rawa
sttModel.largeV3TurboQ5.name: Whisper Turbo Lite
sttModel.largeV3TurboQ5.desc: Te kounga teitei, te rahi kopiti (quantized)
sttModel.belleZh.name: Belle Simplified Chinese
sttModel.belleZh.desc: Te pai rawa mo te Chinese Ngawari
sttModel.base.name: Whisper Base
sttModel.base.desc: Te tere rawa, te tapahuu iti rawa
sttModel.largeV3TurboZhTw.name: Whisper Turbo TW
sttModel.largeV3TurboZhTw.desc: Te pai rawa mo te Chinese Tuku Iho
setup.sttModelChoiceDesc: Whiriwhiri tauira e rite ana ki au hiahia. Ka taea e koe te whakarereke i tenei i muri i roto i nga Tautuhinga.
polishModel.llamaTaiwan.name: Llama 3 Taiwan 8B
polishModel.llamaTaiwan.desc: Te pai rawa mo te Chinese Tuku Iho
polishModel.qwen25.name: Qwen 2.5 7B
polishModel.qwen3.name: Qwen 3 8B
polishModel.qwen3.desc: Te maha reo hou rawa, te mode whakaaaro/kaore whakaaaro
settings.polish.toggleDesc: Whakapai i te whakaako, te whakatau-harikoa, me te marama
settings.polish.reasoningDesc: Arai ki te ahuatanga ki te whakaaro hikihiki i mua o te whakahoki (maai ake)
settings.polish.noRules: Kaore he ture ano. Tāpiri ture ki te whakatika i ngā karanga i ia tono, i ia paetukutuku.
settings.polish.rulePromptPlaceholder: tauira. Whakarito hei imeera me te karanga me te waitohu. Whakamahi kaupapa ture.
settings.polish.rulePromptHint: Ka tāpiri atu enei tohutohu ki te karanga tuatahi ki te whiti i tenei ture.
promptRules.title: Ture Karanga
promptRules.desc: Ka whakahuahia e ture te tono i mua — ka tāpiri atu te tohutohu o te ture tuatahi e whakahuahia ana ki te karanga tuatahi.
promptRules.voiceTipMain: Pēwhea {hotkey} ki te whakaahua i a koe ture a reo.
promptRules.voiceTipExample: tauira. “E hiahia ana au ki te tāpiri ture mo LINE — whakamahi kaupapa kaore-ture, ngata emoji.”
promptRules.voiceRecHint: Whakataukī inaianei — pēwhea {hotkey} ano ki te mutu.
promptRules.voiceEmpty: Kaore he reo kua kitea. Whakamahi ano!
promptRules.basePromptDesc: Ture tūroa STT whakamatau, ka tukuna aunoa i ngā kupu katoa
settings.danger.resetDesc: Whakahoki i ngā tautuhinga katoa ki a ratau uara tuatahi
settings.danger.rerunSetupDesc: Whakaatu te āhuatanga whakatupuranga tuatahi-tīmata ano
confirm.resetMessage: Ka whakahoki tenei i ngā tautuhinga katoa ki a ratau uara tuatahi. Kaore e taea te whakakore.
dictionary.title: Kupu Ā-Teno
dictionary.desc: Tāpiri ingoa tika, ingoa, ka iti ranei kupu kaupapa. Ka whakamahi aunoa te AI i te huarahi tika ki te tutuki i ngā kupu e whanui nei.
dictionary.toggleDesc: Tukutahi kupu kupu ki te karanga whakaoti AI
dictionary.emptyHint: Tāpiri kupu ki te awhina i te AI ki te kite i ngā ingoa me ngā ingoa.
history.title: Hitori
history.privacyNote: Ka noho tūmataiti a koe — ka tiakina te hitori katoa ki te rohe o tenei whare-putea.
history.retentionDesc: Te roa o te tiaki i ngā whakaahuatanga hitori
history.storageLocDesc: Kaupapa hitori me ngā whakarongo kaipukoro e tiakina ana
history.emptyHint: Ka puta mai a au kupu inanei
history.clearAllDesc: Whakakore kaupapa hitori katoa me ngā whakarongo kaipukoro e pūmautanga ana
history.clearAllConfirm: E pirangi koe ki te whakakore i te hitori katoa me ngā whakarongo kaipukoro e pūmautanga ana? Kaore e taea tenei mahi ki te whakakore.
about.title: E pā ana
about.desc: A koe reo, ka tuhituhia. AI-ā-haere whakatauira korero — pēwhea waihanga ki te tao, whakahuatia, ka tukutahi ranei ki a koe porowhita.
about.readyToRestart: Whakahou kua whakahaere — whakahoki ki te whakamahi
about.updateError: Te rapu whakahou kaore i tutuki
about.gatekeeperNote: I muri i te whakahoihoi, ka tonoa te macOS koe ki te whakaae i te tono ano i roto i te Tautuhinga Pūnaha › Te Āhuatanga Tūmataiti me te Haumaru.
setup.permissionsDesc: Me ao atu te Sumi i tenei whakaaetanga ki te tao rongo me te tukutahi kupu ki a koe porowhita.
setup.permMicDesc: Tao i a koe reo mo te whakahuatia
setup.permAccDesc: Tukutahi kupu ki a koe porowhita me {pasteShortcut}
setup.initialDesc: Me tukuiho a Sumi te ahuatanga whakatauira korero (~1.5 GB) mo te whakahuatia e tūturu. Ka penei tenei kotahi ano.
setup.completeDesc: E tutuki ana te ahuatanga whakatauira korero. Ka taea e koe te timata ki te whakamahi i a Sumi inaianei.
setup.llmPromptDesc: Te whakatotika AI ka whakamahi i te LLM kiapii (~4.6 GB) ki te whakapai i a koe kupu — whakatika whakaako, tango tohu, me te whakapai marama. E tūturu ana.
setup.polishChoiceDesc: Whakatika whakaako me ngā kupu tohu aunoa.
setup.polishLocalDesc: E tūturu ana, ~4.6 GB tukuiho. Kaore a koe kaupapa ka wehe mai i tenei whare-putea.
setup.polishCloudDesc: Te tere ake, engari ka tonoa te kupu ki te poutuarongo tuarua. He kī API e hiahia ana.
setup.sttChoiceDesc: Kōwhiri ka whakahuatia e Sumi a koe korero.
setup.sttLocalDesc: E tūturu ana, ~1.5 GB tukuiho. Kaore a koe rongo ka wehe mai i tenei whare-putea.
setup.sttCloudDesc: Te tere ake, te itiiti o te whakapakari. Ka tonoa te rongo ki te poutuarongo tuarua.
setup.errorDefault: He hapa te kore i whakatupuria.
test.step1.title: Whakatika a koe hopuorooro
test.step1.subtitle: Korero te noa ki te kite me he mahi.
test.step1.question: Ka kite koe i ngā pou puru e neke ana?
test.step2.title: Whakatika a koe waihanga
test.step2.subtitle: Pēwhea {hotkey} ki te whakatupuria ka mahi.
test.step2.question: Ka puru ngā kī i te pēwhea?
test.step3.title: Whai kupu Te Whānuitanga
test.step3.instruction: Pēwhea te waahi kupu, pēwhea {hotkey} ki te timata, korero, ka pēwhea ranei {hotkey} ano ki te whakatū
test.step3.sampleText: Whakaaro ki au kia hokona te kiore me te āhuatanga o te haere ki te kāinga inaianei.
test.step4.title: Whakamahi i Gmail!
test.step4.instruction: Pēwhea te tinana imeera, pēwhea {hotkey} ki te timata, korero, ka pēwhea ranei {hotkey} ano ki te whakatū
test.step4.sampleText: Whakamahi: “Kia ora Alice, ka whai ake ā tātau arikā buranui i te rā ā apōpō, i te tuhinga? Alan”
test.step5.title: Whakatika a Reo
test.step5.subtitle: Ko te Whakatika me te Reo e whakamahi ana i te AI kia whakatakoto i au korero kupu ki te kupu i whiriwhiria.
test.step5.polishNotReady: Ko te AI Polish kaore anoa kia whakatakotohia. Whakaahuatia mai i roto i nga Tautuhinga kia whakamahi i te Whakatika me te Reo.
test.step5.polishReady: Kua whakatakotohia te AI Polish. Ka taea e koe te whakamatau i te Whakatika me te Reo inaianei.
test.step5.goToSettings: Whakaahuatia i roto i nga Tautuhinga
test.step6.title: Whakatika me te Reo
test.step6.instruction: Whiriwhiri te kupu katoa, peia te {hotkey} kia timata, korero i au whakatauki whakatika, katahi peia te {hotkey} ano kia whakamahi
test.step6.sampleText: Whakamataara ki te korero: "Whakamāoritia ki te Ingarihi" ranei "Me te ture ake"
test.step6.prefill: Kia ora Alice, kei te tu tonu ranei tatou mo te kai a te pokawhara apopo? Whakaatu mai ki ahau mena ka pai hei a koe. Whiwhinga, Alan
overlay.editRequiresPolish: Ko te whakatika e hiahia ana i te AI Polish
overlay.previewEditHint: Pīoi ki te kupu kia whakatika
settings.behavior.autoPasteDesc: Whakapiri aunoa te whakawhiti ki te waahi o te koki
settings.behavior.preview: Arokite i mua o te whakapiri
settings.behavior.previewDesc: Whakaatu i te whakawhiti kia arokitea i mua o te whakapiri
